body:
I got unfairly banned from this server for hacking, which I didn't do or even know how to do.

Would you please unban me. :)

Br,
TheWeecat

title: Unfairly banned from the server

replies.body:
I advise you appeal here: https://avicus.net/forums?topic_id=50

Making this post won't help your chances of getting appealed. If you did appeal, be patient.

replies.body:
Please appeal in the "Appeal an Infraction" section.
Cheers,
Flyo.
